title: Implement Tauri updater with GitHub CI/CD and Pages
description:
Set up the Tauri v2 updater plugin with complete CI/CD infrastructure:
- Enable updater plugin in Rust code
- Configure tauri.conf.json with updater settings
- Create GitHub workflows for PR testing and tag-based releases
- Set up GitHub Pages for update JSON endpoint and download page

title: Implement Helm Integration
description: Implement Helm integration: List Charts from repositories, List Releases, Install/Upgrade/Uninstall charts.

title: Implement Config Section
description: Implement pages and backend logic for Config resources: ConfigMaps, Secrets, Resource Quotas, Limit Ranges, HPA, PDBs, Priority Classes, Runtime Classes, Leases. Ensure secret values are masked by default.

title: Implement Network Section
description: Implement pages and backend logic for Network resources: Services, Endpoints, Ingresses, Network Policies, Port Forwarding. Include visual status for services and endpoints.

title: Implement App Branding and Logo
description: Create application logo (SVG) and generate app icons for all platforms using `tauri icon`. Update Sidebar to use the new logo.
close_reason: Completed logo creation and icon generation.

title: Fix pnpm configuration for release workflow
description: The release workflow failed with 'packages field missing or empty' because pnpm-workspace.yaml was present but lacked the 'packages' field. This fix moves the configuration to package.json and removes the workspace file.
close_reason: Fixed pnpm configuration by moving it to package.json
